content: followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 2 make 1 double_crochet in the next 2 sts followed by 2 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts round 5 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first st followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next 2 sts repeat around join with a slip_stitch 50 sts *fasten_off legs green make four round 1 make a magic_ring into the magic_ring make 6 single_crochet 6 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 3-4 make 1 single_crochet in each st around 12 sts round 5 make 6 single_crochet inv decrease 6 sts *stuff and fasten_off leave 15cm of yarn to sew the legs to the coaster link to video https //youtu be/yej6lnlw8cm if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
